$interpreted: Barbara: I will absolutely not permit anyone to stir up a storm at the Academy! Guinevere!
Li Hwa: Guess we now know who Barbara's little protector is~
Tica: Ehhh? Even the headmaster is battling!? Sooooo, can I join the fight!? But that's against the Academy's rules~
Tica: Screw it! I mean, I'm helping the headmaster, there's no way I'll get in trouble...right?
Tica: Headmaster Balzac! I'm comingggg~
Aosta: ...Finished!
Elio: ...*gasp*...
Elio: No, something has gone wrong, you must leave!
Elio: Charle——！
Aosta: ...You...
Aosta: ...He's always been the most important, hasn't he?
Tica: Headmaster, NOW!
Barbara: Where do you think you're going?
Aosta: Ugh...
Tica: Elio! You okay!? Headmaster Charle's been looking for you ever since you went missing!
Tica: Ehhhhhhh,Iguessit'smoreliketheformerheadmasterCharle...I'malwaysgettingthatwrong!Imeanlikewhat'swrongwithme??????
Elio: Stupid, annoying idiot. If you keep talking that fast, not even your fellow chimps will understand.
Elio: Did you say...Charle has been looking for me?
Tica: Uh yeah! He'll be soooo happy to see you!
Tica: Eh? Something's not right here...? Elio doesn't talk like that...
Barbara: Mr. Ceres, you are no longer a student of the Academy.
Barbara: You've betrayed the Kingdom. Please leave immediately. The Rune Academy does not want to be involved in this dispute between the nobles.
Elio: Ah, yes...the dummy dumb dumb. I remember you. Once a chimp, always a chimp, I suppose.
Elio: Already over the hill, are we?
Barbara: HOW DARE YOU!?
Aosta: Balzac, control yourself! Can't you tell who that is from his attitude?
Barbara: Hmph. A rude, arrogant young boy. He wants to talk like Professor Dietrich, does he? Well, he's got a long way to go!
Aosta: He doesn't want to talk like Dietrich, he does talk like Dietrich. And that's because...
Aosta: ...he IS Professor Dietrich!
Li Hwa: What!?
Elio: Clovis, am I missing something?
Elio: Also, what happened to you!? You look so different! Charle? Sounds like he was saved as well, no?
Elio: All I can remember...was that the situation wasn't looking right, and I pushed Charle out of the lab——
Aosta: Professor, it's a long story...
Barbara: Enough, cut the crap. Professor Dietrich passed away in an accident years ago!
Elio: Passed away!? Explain yourself!!
Aosta: You and Charle were doing some research and an explosion occurred...
Aosta: I've spent 29 years of my life researching...and I've finally brought you back from the dead.

Aosta: The ceremony was full of uncertainties, so to increase the probablity of success, I brought you back to the lab...
...where you were transformed into a Soul Energy Crystal.
Aosta: Forgive me for taking so long...
Elio: 29 years? So...I've died before?
Tica: Professor Clovis, are you saying－－Elio is not Elio!?
Barbara: Preposterous!
Barbara: Even the most brilliant scholar of Life Magic cannot make a magic formation that can resurrect a living being.
Barbara: The study of Runes is a proper field of study and is not some ridiculous fantasy land where you can live forever and be resurrected from the dead!
Aosta: No! Modern Runes cannot do this, but the ancient Runes handed down by the Immortals can!
Barbara: Nonsense!
Barbara: He is quite clearly Elio Ceres. Where on earth is any trace of Professor Dietrich!?
Aosta: His physical body is indeed that of Ceres' adopted child, but his soul——
Barbara: I see! So you've been hiding in the Academy, trying to cover it up, and you've been found.
Barbara: You think you can just use Professor Dietrich's name and I'll just let you get off scot-free?
Barbara: I won't let you get away with this scheming plan. Miss Chevalier!
Tica: Yes, ma'am!
Barbara: You know the Queen, don't you? Go notify the army and tell them the traitor they're looking for is here.
Li Hwa: Wait a sec, what if it's really——
Elio: Ugh...!
Barbara: Guinevere!?
Elio: ...Oooh, it's you. When did you become so affectionate?
Barbara: Impossible! I've never seen her get close to anyone. She's not even that intimate with me...
Barbara: Guinevere...how dare you treat me as your enemy!?
Elio: Fool. As they say...first come, first serve. After all, it was I who created this being.
Barbara: B-B-B-B-B-B-But...
Elio: And who gave you the authority to give her such a horrible sounding name?
Barbara: His expressions and tone...such utter disdain for others...Professor...are you really Professor Dietrich!?
Morris: ...You bumbling bonobo, of course it is I. But this face...it certainly isn't mine.
Morris: Clovis, this is not a resurrection!? What have you done to this boy and me!?

Model.Text: I will absolutely not permit anyone to stir up a storm at the Academy! Guinevere!
Guess we now know who Barbara's little protector is~
Ehhh? Even the headmaster is battling!? Sooooo, can I join the fight!? But that's against the Academy's rules~
Screw it! I mean, I'm helping the headmaster, there's no way I'll get in trouble...right?
Headmaster Balzac! I'm comingggg~
...Finished!
No, something has gone wrong, you must leave!
Charle——！
...He's always been the most important, hasn't he?
Headmaster, NOW!
Where do you think you're going?
Ugh...
Elio! You okay!? Headmaster Charle's been looking for you ever since you went missing!
Ehhhhhhh,Iguessit'smoreliketheformerheadmasterCharle...I'malwaysgettingthatwrong!Imeanlikewhat'swrongwithme??????
Stupid, annoying idiot. If you keep talking that fast, not even your fellow chimps will understand.
Did you say...Charle has been looking for me?
Uh yeah! He'll be soooo happy to see you!

Mr. Ceres, you are no longer a student of the Academy.
You've betrayed the Kingdom. Please leave immediately. The Rune Academy does not want to be involved in this dispute between the nobles.
Ah, yes...the dummy dumb dumb. I remember you. Once a chimp, always a chimp, I suppose.
Already over the hill, are we?

Balzac, control yourself! Can't you tell who that is from his attitude?
Hmph. A rude, arrogant young boy. He wants to talk like Professor Dietrich, does he? Well, he's got a long way to go!
He doesn't want to talk like Dietrich, he does talk like Dietrich. And that's because...
...he IS Professor Dietrich!
What!?
Clovis, am I missing something?
Also, what happened to you!? You look so different! Charle? Sounds like he was saved as well, no?
All I can remember...was that the situation wasn't looking right, and I pushed Charle out of the lab——
Professor, it's a long story...
Enough, cut the crap. Professor Dietrich passed away in an accident years ago!
Passed away!? Explain yourself!!
You and Charle were doing some research and an explosion occurred...
I've spent 29 years of my life researching...and I've finally brought you back from the dead.

The ceremony was full of uncertainties, so to increase the probablity of success, I brought you back to the lab...
...where you were transformed into a Soul Energy Crystal.
Forgive me for taking so long...
29 years? So...I've died before?
Professor Clovis, are you saying－－Elio is not Elio!?
Preposterous!
Even the most brilliant scholar of Life Magic cannot make a magic formation that can resurrect a living being.
The study of Runes is a proper field of study and is not some ridiculous fantasy land where you can live forever and be resurrected from the dead!
No! Modern Runes cannot do this, but the ancient Runes handed down by the Immortals can!
Nonsense!
He is quite clearly Elio Ceres. Where on earth is any trace of Professor Dietrich!?
His physical body is indeed that of Ceres' adopted child, but his soul——
I see! So you've been hiding in the Academy, trying to cover it up, and you've been found.
You think you can just use Professor Dietrich's name and I'll just let you get off scot-free?
I won't let you get away with this scheming plan. Miss Chevalier!
Yes, ma'am!
You know the Queen, don't you? Go notify the army and tell them the traitor they're looking for is here.
Wait a sec, what if it's really——
Ugh...!
Guinevere!?
...Oooh, it's you. When did you become so affectionate?
Impossible! I've never seen her get close to anyone. She's not even that intimate with me...
Guinevere...how dare you treat me as your enemy!?
Fool. As they say...first come, first serve. After all, it was I who created this being.
B-B-B-B-B-B-But...
And who gave you the authority to give her such a horrible sounding name?
His expressions and tone...such utter disdain for others...Professor...are you really Professor Dietrich!?
...You bumbling bonobo, of course it is I. But this face...it certainly isn't mine.
Clovis, this is not a resurrection!? What have you done to this boy and me!?

When did you become so affectionate?","sfxName":"h0043_story_006","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_212_005_dialog_english##_30_000","SpeakerName":"Barbara","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3198c4","IconName":"h3198c4_anger","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Impossible! I've never seen her get close to anyone. She's not even that intimate with me...","sfxName":"human_female_young_royal_10","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_212_005_dialog_english##_31_000","SpeakerName":"Barbara","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3198c4","IconName":"h3198c4_anger","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Guinevere...how dare you treat me as your enemy!?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_212_005_dialog_english##_31_001","SpeakerName":"Elio","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/n3336c4","IconName":"n3336c4_sp2","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Fool. As they say...first come, first serve. After all, it was I who created this being.","sfxName":"h0043_story_008","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_212_005_dialog_english##_31_002","SpeakerName":"Barbara","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3198c4","IconName":"h3198c4_nervous","IconLocate":2,"Text":"B-B-B-B-B-B-But...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_212_005_dialog_english##_31_003","SpeakerName":"Elio","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/n3336c4","IconName":"n3336c4_sp2","IconLocate":2,"Text":"And who gave you the authority to give her such a horrible sounding name?","sfxName":"h0043_story_001","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_212_005_dialog_english##_32_000","SpeakerName":"Barbara","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3198c4","IconName":"h3198c4_nervous","IconLocate":2,"Text":"His expressions and tone...such utter disdain for others...Professor...are you really Professor Dietrich!?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_212_005_dialog_english##_33_000","SpeakerName":"Morris","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/n3336c4","IconName":"n3336c4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"...You bumbling bonobo, of course it is I. But this face...it certainly isn't mine.","sfxName":"h0043_story_020_ver2","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_212_005_dialog_english##_34_000","SpeakerName":"Morris","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/n3336c4","IconName":"n3336c4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Clovis, this is not a resurrection!? What have you done to this boy and me!?","sfxName":"h0043_story_032","sfxVolume":1.0}]}
